name: AXCustomContent
desc: Objects that define custom content and the timing of its output.

items.name: init(attributedLabel: NSAttributedString, attributedValue: NSAttributedString)
items.desc: Creates new custom content with an attributed string and attributed value.

items.name: init(label: String, value: String)
items.desc: Creates new custom content with a label and value.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: A localized string that identifies the label for this content.

items.name: var attributedLabel: NSAttributedString
items.desc: A localized attributed string that identifies the label for this content.

items.name: var value: String
items.desc: A localized string that provides a value for the label.

items.name: var attributedValue: NSAttributedString
items.desc: A localized attributed string that provides a value for the label.

items.name: var importance: AXCustomContent.Importance
items.desc: An object that determines when to output custom accessibility content.

items.name: enum AXCustomContent.Importance
items.desc: Objects that control the timing of content output.
